programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam learns to make authentic beef rendang from a local Muslim family. He visits the National Archives of Singapore to learn about his mother's family, and continues his search for inspiration for his Singapore banquet dinner.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam visits Peranakan food legend Violet Oon's restaurant, National Kitchen. He then heads to Chinatown to visit Aussie Dave Pynt's restaurant, Burnt Ends.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore

programme.title: Sports Detectives
programme.desc: A young Muhammad Ali clinched Olympic gold in 1960, but returned home to the same bigotry he’d left behind. Disillusioned, it’s said that he threw his medal into the Ohio River. Head to Kentucky and uncover the real story behind this legendary tale.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, the first animals had eyes that were unable to distinguish color -- yet as that changed, ‘seeing in color’ gave animals many advantages, whether to find food, attract a mate or warn off an enemy.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural world’s most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: Bornean Elephants
programme.desc: The documentary takes the perspective of Bornean elephants in Sabah as they traverse through the landscape and show how these gentle giants can coexist with humans amidst different challenges faced.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: Meet some late-life lovers and explore the reasons behind their sexual longevity and their ability to reproduce well into their later years.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: What does it take to maintain alpha status as animals grow older? We investigate the responsibilities and challenges that come with being a senior leader of a pack.

programme.title: The Presidents
programme.desc: Explore Bill Clinton's complex legacy, from Arkansas roots to White House highs (economic prosperity) and lows (scandals, impeachment), and his impact on American politics.

programme.title: Sports Detectives
programme.desc: Wilt Chamberlain is the only NBA player to have scored a remarkable 100 points in a game. Investigate what happened to his 100-point ball. Then, examine a controversial Kentucky Derby trophy that may have been falsely identified.

programme.desc: Klaus is injured and Veruca’s mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Veruca’s rekindled powers.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Jun breaks the rules by sneaking a small, adorable dragon out of the Crystal Realm and bringing it home, but finds that her older brother, Eugene, has arrived and watches her every move.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and D’Angelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Tuffnut goes undercover to help the gang rescue a Skrill captured by the Beserkers.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: With Snotlout’s fate unclear, Gustav tries to fill in for him at the Dragon Academy.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Hiccup, Toothless, and the dragon riders discover an injured Scauldron on the shores of Changewing Island. When the Scauldron takes a shine to Ruffnut, the kids see a chance to heal the dragon and return him safely to the ocean, before he falls victim to the elements, as well as the territorial Changewings.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: During an ice storm, Speed Stingers infest Berk, driving the residents into hiding.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: The gang must help the town ready for harvest but Hookfang and Stormfly are at each other’s throats.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: A dangerous flu is spreading throughout Berk and Toothless is it’s latest victim.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: A rogue species of dragon terrorizes Berk by stealing all of the metal in town.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Three adolescent thunderdrums are wrecking havoc on Berk and only Thornado can control them.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: After disobeying orders, Snotlout is expelled from the academy. Meanwhile, Alvin comes to Berk to make amends- but can he be trusted?

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Hiccup and the gang must rescue Stoick with assistance from… Berk’s archenemy Alvin.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimi’s not exactly who she says she is. Our villains’ alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Klaus is injured and Veruca’s mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Veruca’s rekindled powers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: The Duchess seeks Artephius' soul for her spell collection, and it's up to Puss to protect him. It turns out that The Duchess and Artephius have a complicated relationship.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home – until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that they’ve made over the kids’ rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own – Wu and Wei.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Trying to win Tabitha's loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. But when the top-secret UBO goes missing, the outsiders Tabitha and Tim (who's tagged along to relive his glory days) immediately become the number one suspects.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Waldo and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Paramedic Paranormal When Jimmy breaks out in hives, Casper and his friends have no choice but to bring him to the human hospital. Back To Ghoul When Casper's uncles Stinky, Fatso and Stretch decide to go back to Scare School, Casper is thrilled.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: It's Tidy Toyland Day and Noddy wants to win the Tidy Toyland Trophy. Unfortunately he's also invited the untidy Pirates round to play! Noddy has to figure out how he can play with the Pirates and win the Tidy Toyland Trophy.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa is inspired by his friends to search for his favourite noise in the jingly jangly jungle. The little lion cub and his friends set out to find out what Raa Raa's Favourite Noise could be…

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess and Horace want to play Boat Racing on the pond - but first the need work out how to make a boat! Some things are too heavy, some are too light… having tried lots of options and worked out that they need something light and boat shaped, they make Mimi's paper hats into boats for their boat race. Perfect!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: It's Willow's apple picking party today, but some of the friends just are too chilly to go. Jess tries to work out how to keep them all warm, should they cover themselves in mud just like frogs do? Should they wrap themselves up in straw? Or might running around be the trick to getting them all toasty warm?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Kelp and Scallop discover Mr. Pearly has a cave full of stuff they help him to realize it could help a lot of other sea creatures. / When the group goes camping, Kelp helps Ollie learn that even though it didn’t go exactly as planned, they can still have loads of fun.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The team arrives in India where an old friend of Rukhmini can supposedly give them a pendant that will lead to the next Tianshang weapon. But when they arrive, they find that Rukhmini’s hometown has changed a lot in the thirty years she’s been gone, and her old friend Diya might not be willing to help them.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yi’s violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yi’s music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and D’Angelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Creek arrives at a Trolls potluck empty-handed, explaining that a strange creature ate the fondue he meant to bring. The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesn’t believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: The kids scare away a swarm of bees. But when they realize bees make the flowers happy, they hatch a plan to get them back! / When Scallop makes a bad choice, Kelp helps her learn from her mistakes.

programme.title: CSI S4 E19 - Bad Words
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S2)

programme.title: Alone: Frozen (S1)
programme.desc: Despite the cruel temperatures, the final two participants march onward towards day 50. The survivalists struggle knowing that at any time the smallest mistake could send them home.

programme.title: How Disney Built America

programme.title: Bukas May Pangarap
programme.desc: A peasant couple set all their worldly possesions so that the husband can take advantage of an overseas job offer. But a tragedy is bound to bring his marriage and family life to ruin.

programme.title: Pulis Probinsya (Pat. Omar Abdullah)
programme.desc: A cop from the province gets a new assignment in the big city. He was disappointed to find out that he would be living and working in a different turf where the games played are almost always deadly.

programme.title: Astig
programme.desc: Dennis Padilla and Janno Gibbs made their living by putting one over small time con-artists. They became very good at what they were doing so that they were soon recruited into the big-time.

programme.title: Sala Sa Init, Sala Sa Lamig
programme.desc: Bingo was a bounty hunter. He hunted prized criminals dead or alive. On the other hand, Vina was a street hustler. They crossed paths when Bingo rented a space near Vina purposely to track down a professional hitman, Mike.

programme.title: Contreras Gang
programme.desc: Contreras Gang

programme.title: Sa Diyos Lang Ako Susuko
programme.desc: Romano disobeyed his father when he became a soldier. The old man believed that peace could only be attained if people were to avoid all forms of violence. How ironic for him then to come home and find his father murdered and the criminals unknown and unpunished?

programme.title: Pati Ba Pintig ng Puso? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia was at his best as the autocratic patriarch who ruled his family and all the people around him with an iron hand. But his grandson would have none of this.

programme.title: Tatlo Silang Tatay Ko
programme.desc: Siamese triplets Brando, Butch and Bronson (TVJ) are forced to take in the newly-orphaned Nitoy (Niño Muhlach). The journey from downright hostility to tolerance to acceptance and finally to filial love is a fun adventure guaranteed to amuse everybody.

programme.title: Pablik Enemi 1 N 2: Aksidental Heroes
programme.desc: Redford White and Dennis Padilla team in this fast paced wacky adventure as two bumbling idiots on the run after accidentally picking up a suitcase full of smuggled goods.

programme.title: Sa Kabila ng Lahat
programme.desc: Dina Bonnevie was a famous television commentator whose work was focused on social issues particularly corruption in the government. However, because she was having an affair with a politician, who was helping her further her career, she turned a blind eye to his own evil deeds.

programme.title: Sa Hirap at Ginhawa (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: In the story, a young couple eloped, got married and then must cope with problems like money, living on their own, trying to finish school and raising a baby.

programme.title: Demolisyon
programme.desc: This film presents the struggles of people to have a home of their own and the pain and the anguish they face when they are forced out of their homes and the shanties they thought they owned are demolished.

programme.title: Sa Totoo Lang
programme.desc: Some of the country's finest actors joined the fun in this witty and totally hilarious look into the sex lives of lower middle class women who were old and single or separated, widowed, grass widowed, fooling around and everything else you could think of plus the assortment of men they met, fell for, cheated on, disliked, feared or anything else.

programme.title: NHK WORLD SHOWCASE
programme.desc: NHK WORLD SHOWCASE covers a variety of genres, including special features and pilot episodes of newly-developed programs.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: J-MELO
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week: Hamaura Ayano (a former Hello! Project artist who moved into acting and is now a solo singer) and BUDDiiS (a dance-and-vocal group with 10 unique members).

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-11.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Hyper-modern Japanese kitchens are compact, comfortable spaces for cooking and eating. We look at the history and evolution of this space at the heart of every Japanese home.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: Kitties love hanging out by the seaside in Ehime's pleasant, warm climate. See a kitty making rounds at an orange farm before finding some beautiful autumn foliage with the help of a kitty-guide.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN Highlights
programme.desc: Join us on a trip to Gifu, located near the center of Japan's main island, and experience its blossoming cherry trees, its snow-covered central mountains, and its inspiring people and traditions.

programme.title: Story Land in Classical Japanese
programme.desc: This program presents masterpieces of classical Japanese literature in both their original forms and modern translations, with easy-to-understand imagery that conveys the worldview of ancient Japan.

programme.title: TAKE TECH
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Soho in London was formerly a town of immigrants. Long known as one of the most bohemian areas of London, Soho is considered the place for enjoying the arts, revelry, and late-night entertainment.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 3
programme.desc: Jesse knows you don't strike it rich if you play it safe, so he gambles big on a risky bin. Then, Lori defies her husband Brandon and buys a questionable unit. Will her bold move lead to a dynasty or divorce? And later, lightning erupts when the buyers battle it out for a puzzle of parts they hope will add up to one smooth ride.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 4
programme.desc: Big money brings out fierce competition at a rare high-stakes RV auction. Then, the contents of a locker spill out at our bidders' feet, smashing several dangerous objects. Will it bring seven years of bad luck, or a 7-figure payday? And later, Jesse's experience with antiques makes him think treasures lie behind the iron curtain.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 5
programme.desc: A deadly bin puts all the buyers on edge. It's a bad omen that casts a dark shadow over the day. As the day winds to a fever pitch, Brandon and Lori square off against Scott and Chrissy in a do or die bidding war that sends all strategy out the window. And later, our competitors uncover a high-tech find they think could worth thousands. But all that glitters may not be gold.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 6
programme.desc: Cash flies over a locker that reveals a high-ticket mystery item. Then, everyone digs deep to win an ATM, but when the dust settles will this thing be filled with big bucks or major regret? And later, the unlikeliest of duos team up with a strategy that leaves our buyers' heads spinning.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 7
programme.desc: In Vegas, an old rivalry resurfaces. Then, a locker reveals a covered item that's thought to be a vintage car, but when the bidding ends will the buyer drive away with a fortune or stall out in failure? And later, it's every man for himself when a unit full of gemstones ignites an all out war among the competition.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 8
programme.desc: A mega-find leaves the winning bidder scratching his head, but when the true nature of this item is revealed he'll be swimming in more than just cash. Then, the gloves come off when T-Money scrambles to scoop up a locker filled with vintage bar equipment. And later, Scott spots something he hopes no one else sees. If his secret stays safe, he could quadruple his profit.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 6
programme.desc: Luthor plans to move LuthorCorp to Smallville, but finds opposition in Lana. Sarah faces a difficult decision, and Clark confronts Luthor face-to-face.

programme.title: Friends S5 23
programme.desc: The gang decides to go out to Las Vegas to surprise Joey and to celebrate Monica's and Chandler's one-year anniversary.

programme.title: Friends S5 24
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler get lucky in Las Vegas, Nevada. Rachel makes Ross regret playing a prank on her. Joey schemes for fame and fortune.

programme.title: Friends S6 1
programme.desc: Ross and Rachel wake up with hangovers – and married. Chandler and Monica don't get married, but he asks her if he can move in with her instead.

programme.title: Friends S6 2
programme.desc: Chandler and Monica tell Joey and Rachel that they want to live together. Monica is hurt that Rachel doesn't react as strongly as Joey. Phoebe tries to find out how Ross really feels about Rachel.

programme.title: Friends S6 3
programme.desc: Suave Joey is as confident as usual while preparing to make love with Rachel for the first time. Ross goes to a spray-on tanning salon but fails to follow the simple directions properly.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 6
programme.desc: Luthor plans to move LuthorCorp to Smallville, but finds opposition in Lana. Sarah faces a difficult decision, and Clark confronts Luthor face-to-face.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 05
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin go undercover as they find out which hacks work best for opening a beer bottle. Plus, they discover new hacks for cleaning, throwing a great party, and using a ballpoint pen in ways you'd never imagine.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 06
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin put their hacking skills to the test as they find out which hacks work best for popping popcorn and polishing silverware. Plus, they'll uncover the best hacks for working out and using dental floss.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 07
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin take hacking to the next level as they uncover the best hacks for cooking pizza and cutting cake. Plus, they'll show why bread is a true All-Star, and teach you some hacks that every parent needs to know.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 08
programme.desc: Our hosts find hacks for retrieving lost objects, separating egg yolks, and removing wallpaper stains. They'll also make duct tape an All-Star, find another use for walnuts, and show you how to hack your home while you're away.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 09
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin swim in the back of a truck, cook steak in a bag, and turn bike parts into a clock. Plus, they add coffee filters to the All-Star club, uncover road trip tips, and craft hacks to defend against your sick spouse.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 2
programme.desc: A battle of wills between Sheldon and Penny leaves Amy caught in the middle, while Leonard tries to spice up his long-distance relationship with Priya (AARTI MANN).

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 3
programme.desc: Attending a co-worker's wedding, Leonard and Amy (MAYIM BIALIK) get to know each other better, while Howard and Bernadette spend the weekend with Mrs. Wolowitz!

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 4
programme.desc: When Raj is upset he's the only one of the four guys who's not in a relationship, Penny sets out to find the perfect date, introducing him to Emily, a girl he can actually talk to!

programme.title: Wrath Of The Titans
programme.desc: Taking place 10 years after his heroic defeat of the Kraken, Perseus (Sam Worthington) embarks on a treacherous quest into the underworld to rescue his father, overthrow the Titans and save mankind.

programme.title: Magnum Force
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Clint Eastwood stars as San Francisco Police Inspector Harry Callahan better known as "Dirty Harry" because of the tough way he pursues criminals in this bare-knuckled action film. Investigating the assassinations of crime bosses, Dirty Harry discovers the killers are police who, frustrated by the judicial system, have vowed to rid the city of crime by any means--even killing fellow police officers.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 5
programme.desc: Sheldon and Leonard get invited to a housewarming party at WIL WHEATON's house; while Howard gets an out-of-this-world opportunity!

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 6
programme.desc: A cute comic book artist (guest star COURTNEY FORD) puts Leonard's relationship with Priya to the test; while Sheldon, getting into the spirit of Halloween, tries to scare the guys.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 6
programme.desc: Let the revelry begin as 20 of the most boneheaded partiers throw down. From twerking babes to an overzealous Willie Nelson fan and a drunken keg stand you can't un-see. Plus awesome commentary from our cast of comics, including Brendon Walsh, KevinMcCaffrey and Jaime Andrews

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 7
programme.desc: This hour, the joke's on you... and on 20 of the World's Dumbest Pranksters. Their tricks include everything from a terrifying wake up call, to telekinesis, and a not-so-dead body in the trunk of a taxi. With real jokes provided by our cast of hilarious comedians, including Mike Trainor, Chris Fairbanks, and Katlyn Carlson.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 8
programme.desc: Put Thomas Edison to shame with 20 of the World's Smartest Inventions - from a bird feeder with a shocking high-voltage surprise, to a bowl made entirely of bacon, and a whacky way to grow bananas at home. With innovative commentary from our cast ofhilarious comedians, including Mike O'Gorman, Jared Logan and Judy Gold.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 9
programme.desc: Let freedom ring, as World's Dumbest presents "Only in America." Featuring 20 of the most patriotic patriots in the land - from a cop's strange take on the national anthem, to a dangerous mishap with a bald eagle, and the most insane thank you to thetroops ever put on film. Plus awesome commentary from our cast of America's best comics, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey and Jaime Andrews.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 10
programme.desc: The spotlight shines on 20 of the Worlds Dumbest Performers. From an underwear clad girl giving a sobriety test, to amateur firework technicians, plus a funeral home Christmas greeting that will send shivers down your spine - these dumb performers shine in the roles they were born to play. Plus, awesome commentary from our cast of comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey and Jaime Andrews.

programme.desc: Big Story is a documentary film program on CGTN. It explores global events with in a variety of filmic styles and featuring original, in-depth, thought-provoking storytelling.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues.

programme.title: Leaders Talk
programme.desc: Leaders Talk is China Media Group’s new current affairs program featuring one-on-one interviews with heads of state and high-ranking government officials and heads of international organizations. They will share their insights on the major events shaping today’s world, providing an international viewpoint to understand our times, the visions we share, the challenges we face and the efforts we can make for a better future.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China's perspective, policies and stories.

programme.title: Biz Talk
programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. It presents 360 degree profiles of industry movers and shakers, tech mavericks and policymakers, and drills down on the stories behind their success, to give you clarity on what’s happening in every facet of business.

programme.title: Zoom in
programme.desc: A TV news magazine show packed with top stories from around the world. The weekly program zooms in on the details of trending news items and zooms out to give viewers the bigger picture. With in-depth analysis and current perspective, Zoom in takes you on a journey beyond the daily headlines.

programme.title: The World Today

programme.title: China 24

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.desc: Abbey Gelmi and the panel discuss Australia v South Africa in Cricket's World Test Championship Final, NSW will take a 1-0 series lead into State of Origin Game 2 in Perth, plus AFL, Super Rugby Semi-Finals and Super Netball.

programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 119
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. James Glenday and Emma Rebellato present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories plus Catherine Murphy with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 119
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Rocky II
programme.desc: Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: A petty thief aspires to become a member of the notorious Axe Gang during the 1940s in Canton, China.

programme.title: Marathon Man
programme.desc: A Columbia graduate student unknowingly gets caught up in a terrifying nightmare masterminded by a Nazi fugitive. Lawrence Olivier was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become "real" so that he can regain the love of his human mother.

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: A poor laborer father and his young son's lives are turned upside down when a fascinating and strange new pet enters their world. Amid the resulting comic mayhem, they ultimately learn a poignant lesson about the true nature of family and the things money can't buy.

programme.title: How To Train Your Dragon 2
programme.desc: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

programme.title: Star Trek (2009)
programme.desc: A prequel focusing on a young James T. Kirk and Mr. Spock, chronicling their first meeting at Starfleet Academy and their first space mission.

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Susie Salmon was murdered, she left her unfinished life behind. But now from her place in a strange but beautiful in-between world, she must help her father catch her killer and protect her family before she can finally move on. Filled with thrilling suspense, hope and the redeeming power of love.

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: A poor laborer father and his young son's lives are turned upside down when a fascinating and strange new pet enters their world. Amid the resulting comic mayhem, they ultimately learn a poignant lesson about the true nature of family and the things money can't buy.

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

programme.title: The Nutcracker
programme.desc: Tchaikovsky's score, George Balanchine's choreograpy and Oscar®-winner Kevin Kline's narration combine to tell the timeless story of young Marie, who falls asleep after a Christmas party to dream that her gifts come to life.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady
programme.desc: Beautiful Alice has a successful career but is in love with a married man, thus becoming very lonely. She can only find companionship in her cleaning lady Shelly, a mysterious girl whose face is scarred by burns. As they become closer, Alice accidentally discovers Shelly's dark history and is soon embroiled in a horrific act of revenge.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jia Hao and his friends gather to celebrate his birthday at a villa. However, the festivities take a dark turn when they connect to a deadly VR game in which they must light candles and dodge ghosts to survive. Tragedy strikes as two of his friends fall victim to the escalating horrors within, plunging them all deeper into a chilling nightmare.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A school girl joins two internet content creators in a horror video project filmed in an old building behind their school. The trio encounters a bullying gang and as events unfold, it becomes clear that the girl holds a personal grudge against the gang and is blinded by hatred to exercise justice, even if it means sacrificing the innocents…

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Lexy's life becomes a living nightmare after surviving a huge white shark attack in which her father and sister died. However, with the help of a psychiatrist, she delves deeper into the haunting flashbacks and gradually uncovers the truth of what happened that fateful night.

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: Two housemaids and a driver take shelter at their employer's mansion when a zombie outbreak happens one night. Can they all survive the night?

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady
programme.desc: Beautiful Alice has a successful career but is in love with a married man, thus becoming very lonely. She can only find companionship in her cleaning lady Shelly, a mysterious girl whose face is scarred by burns. As they become closer, Alice accidentally discovers Shelly's dark history and is soon embroiled in a horrific act of revenge.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jia Hao and his friends gather to celebrate his birthday at a villa. However, the festivities take a dark turn when they connect to a deadly VR game in which they must light candles and dodge ghosts to survive. Tragedy strikes as two of his friends fall victim to the escalating horrors within, plunging them all deeper into a chilling nightmare.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A school girl joins two internet content creators in a horror video project filmed in an old building behind their school. The trio encounters a bullying gang and as events unfold, it becomes clear that the girl holds a personal grudge against the gang and is blinded by hatred to exercise justice, even if it means sacrificing the innocents…

programme.title: Nightmare of Darkness
programme.desc: A young actress’ Weibo account is refreshed with a new post three years after her death, disclosing her dating picture with young idol Wu Zi Zhen. Wu seeks help from the PR consultant Qiao Shen at his haunted house, but encounters a series of horrifying incidents. After being interrogated by Qiao, Wu lowers his guard and unveils a shocking secret…

programme.title: The Nightmares
programme.desc: A young and successful doctor is tortured by recurrent nightmares after a child patient dies accidentally. The line between dreams and reality starts to blur when the faceless killer from these nightmares comes to life and hunts her down.

programme.title: Apartment 212
programme.desc: Jennifer moves into a new apartment after leaving her abusive husband. As she starts life anew, something keeps biting her when she sleeps, leading her to be sleep deprived, paranoid and paralyzed with fear of the unseen.

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. While waiting for her husband in their new house, Mary becomes the target of an evil slasher that stalks the suburbs in an ice-cream truck. She soon learns that the suburbs are not what they seem...

programme.title: Nightmare of Darkness
programme.desc: A young actress’ Weibo account is refreshed with a new post three years after her death, disclosing her dating picture with young idol Wu Zi Zhen. Wu seeks help from the PR consultant Qiao Shen at his haunted house, but encounters a series of horrifying incidents. After being interrogated by Qiao, Wu lowers his guard and unveils a shocking secret…

programme.title: The Nightmares
programme.desc: A young and successful doctor is tortured by recurrent nightmares after a child patient dies accidentally. The line between dreams and reality starts to blur when the faceless killer from these nightmares comes to life and hunts her down.

programme.title: Apartment 212
programme.desc: Jennifer moves into a new apartment after leaving her abusive husband. As she starts life anew, something keeps biting her when she sleeps, leading her to be sleep deprived, paranoid and paralyzed with fear of the unseen.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Marjorie has collected items from thrift stores and estate sales over the years for various projects, which has led to a massive amount of clutter in her home, making living in the space very difficult.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: A teen gets nabbed for being in the wrong place at the wrong time, while a man who left town with a warrant gets caught when he returns for his aunt's funeral and faces a one million dollar bail.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S3)
programme.desc: Police reopen the cold case murder of a young Marine who was killed in a hotel room and charge the woman who was with him at the time. Is she the mastermind behind his death or an innocent victim?

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: After a beloved pastor's second wife is killed in a tragic car crash, it raises suspicions over the death of his first wife. Her death never sat easy with distinguished pathologist Dr. Wayne Ross.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15)
programme.desc: Tulsa detectives believe the victim of a shooting was a Good Samaritan who'd been robbed. But at trial, the jury must decide if his killer actually acted in fear of his own life.

programme.title: Court Cam: Top Five Outrageous Judges 3
programme.desc: A look at the top five most outrageous judges on Court Cam.

programme.title: Court Cam: Top Five Accused Killers 3
programme.desc: A look at the top five accused killers on Court Cam.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A suspect loses his cool in the interrogation room; a man with a shocking gunshot wound leaves police with more questions than answers; a game of hide and seek turns deadly; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A model is questioned about a deadly encounter with her boyfriend; a man makes a cold-blooded confession; a person of interest says too much; and more.

programme.title: 60 Days In (S8)
programme.desc: Sparks fly and tempers flare as host Mona Scott-Young grills the original six participants, who reunite with Sheriff Dance and Chief Capehart for the first time since leaving the program.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Social media influencer Alexis Murphy was on her way to a hair appointment, but never arrived. When a photo of her abandoned car was posted online, her worried loved-ones knew something was terribly wrong.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A middle-aged woman holds a restaurant manager hostage. First responders hurry to locate a young woman who flipped her car. A married couple in Ohio defend themselves after an intruder enters their home.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Christine and Jason Harris fell in love young. Christina finds Jason caring and supportive and after marrying, they have two children. But then Christina makes a shocking discovery.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A typical Sunday morphs into a violent gunfight when two armed men invade a family's home; an unsuspecting impound lot worker checks out a disturbance and is nearly mowed down by an irate woman.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A woman attacks a bus driver in an out-of-control road rage incident; a man is beaten to within an inch of his life in a hate crime; a woman is brutally assaulted by her ex in a dollar store. And more.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: When a Georgia college student disappears, police open an investigation into a possible hate crime and abduction. However, Dr. Jamie Downs uncovers evidence that spins the case in a new direction.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: One FBI undercover agent meets with suspects in Denmark in an effort to retrieve one of the world's lost treasures; another agent takes on an unlikely suspect believed to be planning a murder for hire.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Tales of toxic love triangles—wives who stray from their husbands with disastrous results, a deadly case of online catfishing, and a lonely young woman who has an affair with a killer.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When a loving wife and mother is found stabbed to death inside her home, a team of investigators dedicate eight years to finding her killer.

programme.title: 60 Days In (S8)
programme.desc: Orion and Kendra are revealed to everyone, and tensions boil over when Jacob goes head to head with the other participants. Sheriff Dance and Chief Capehart reveal what lies ahead for PCDC.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach proper and improper, similar and dissimilar and equivalent fractions. These also explain lines and symmetrical designs, continuous and repeating patterns, and mathematical sentences involving multiplication and division of whole numbers.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about homonyms, homographs, and hyponyms. These also talk about identifying the elements, comparing, and contrasting information from stories and how to write it. The videos also teach about words, phrases, and setences with long vowels.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pag- unawa at pagpapahalaga sa pagkakakilanlang kultural ng kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the motion of objects, sources and uses of light, sound, heat and electricity.

programme.title: Grade 4 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng mga pang-abay, pang-uri, pang-angkop, pangatnig, salitang naglalarawan. Tinatalakay din dito ang pagsulat ng pangungusap, talata, at balita. Sa mga palabas din na ipapaliwanag kung paano magsuri ng mga kuwento at mga pahayag.

programme.title: Grade 4 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about parallel and perpendicular lines, angles, triangles, and quadrilaterals. These also explain about continuous and repeating patterns and number sentences and the concept of time, perimeter, area, and volume.

programme.title: Grade 4 English
programme.desc: In these episodes, adverbs, signal words, and graphic organizers will be discussed. These will aslo teach how to analyze a story and how to infer the speaker's tone, mood and purpose.

programme.title: Grade 4 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito naipamamalas ang pang- unawa sa bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan sa lipunan, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng bansa.

programme.title: Grade 4 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about the force that can change the shape, size or movement of objects and how light, heat and sound travel using various objects.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng pang-angkop, pangatnig, salitang may lapi, at iba't ibang uri ng pangungusap. Pag-aaralan din dito ang pagbibigay ng lagom, pagsusuri ng pahayag, at pagkuha ng impormasyon sa tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about understanding of solid figures, sequence in forming rules, expressions and equations. These also talk about rate and speed, and of area and surface area of plane and solid or space figures.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about presenting reports on different viewpoints and evaluating narratives.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito pag-uusapan ang mas malalim na pag-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa pagpupunyagi ng mga Pilipino tungo sa pagtugon sa mga suliranin, isyu at hamon ng kasarinlan.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: These episodes focus on gravity and friction affect movement of objects and how energy is transformed in simple machines.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri at paghahambing ng iba't ibang uri ng panitikan. Pag-aaralan din dito ang tungkol sa mga estratehiya sa pagkuha ng impormasyon, sa wastong paggamit ng impormal na komunikasyon at angkop na ekspresyon sa pagbabahagi ng ideya o ipinyon tungkol sa mga tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of axiomatic structure of geometry and triangle congruence.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: These episodes examines biases and propagandas. These also teach about using parallelism and cohesive devices in different types of speech.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa naging transpormasyon tungo sa makabagong panahon ng mga bansa at rehiyon sa daigdig bunsod ng paglaganap ng mga kaisipan sa agham, politika, at ekonomiya tungo sa pagbuo ng pandaigdigan kamalayan.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: These episodes are about the particle nature of matter as basis for explaining properties, physical changes, and structure of substances and mixtures. These also talk about the identity of a substance according to its atomic structure and the periodic table of elements as an organizing tool to determine the chemical properties of elements.

programme.title: Grade 10 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa iba't ibang uri ng panitikan at sa pagsusulat at pagsusuri ng mga ito. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang paggamit ng wastong mga pahayag at angkop na mga salita sa pagsusulat ng reaksiyon sa mga teksto at napanood na video.

programme.title: Grade 10 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of combinatorics and probability.

programme.title: Grade 10 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the different techniques in writing, how to compose and critique it.

programme.title: Grade 10 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa malikhaing hakbang na nagsusulong ng pagtanggap at paggalang sa iba’t ibang kasarian upang maitaguyod ang pagkakapantay- pantay ng tao bilang kasapi ng pamayanan.

programme.title: Grade 10 Science
programme.desc: These episode talk about the organisms as having feedback mechanisms and how these feedback mechanisms help the organism maintain homeostasis. These also explain how information is stored in DNA, how changes in a DNA molecule may cause changes in its products, how mutations that occur, and how evolution through natural selection can result in biodiversity. These also focus on the influence of biodiversity on the stability of ecosystems.
